job.name: TpcGL
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv NODEBUG yes setenv STARFPE NO starver .DEV2 if (! $?) then set file = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set N = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` else exit 1; endif set base = `basename $file .root`; set logFile = ${base}.log echo "${file}" set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${file}"` if ("$f" == "") then root.exe -b -q lGarfield.C 'tpcGL.C+('$N',"'$file'")' >& ${logFile} endif
